delete.need-select-before-delete: Delete statement can't run, need select before delete.

update.need-select-before-update: Update statement can't run, need select before update.

find-one.not-found: Not found, make sure you put the right keyword or data.
find-one.need-where-statement: Need where statement before find any data.

get.success: Success to get user by id

auth.token-required: Token required, don't forget to put the token into body of request
auth.admin-access: Invalid token, your don't have Super Admin access.
